---
labels: ['color palette', 'entity']
description: 'Color palette generation.'
---

import { DefaultColorPalette } from './color-palette.composition';

Generate and maintain color palettes in components. 

```ts
import { ColorPalette } from '@bitdesign/sparks.foundations.color-palette';

const colorPalette = ColorPalette.create({
  primary: {
    origin: '#1E884A'
  }
});

colorPalette.primary.default // #1E884A
```

## Default colors

Default colors generated in the palette

<DefaultColorPalette />
